<rule id="maven-javax-to-jakarta-00017" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="pom.xml" pattern="artifactId>jboss-javaee-all-8.0<"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="potential" effort="1" title="Move to JBoss Jakarta EE BOMs - org.jboss.spec:jboss-javaee-all-8.0">
                    <message>If you migrate your application to JBoss EAP 7.3 (or later), and want to ensure its Maven building, running or testing works as expected, use instead the JBoss Jakarta EE BOM with groupId `org.jboss.spec`, and artifactId `jboss-jakartaee-all-8.0`.</message>
                    <link href="https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_jboss_enterprise_application_platform/7.3/html-single/migration_guide/index#changes-to-boms-for-jakarta-ee" title="Red Hat JBoss EAP 7.3 Migration Guide: Changes to BOMs for Jakarta EE 8"/>
                    <tag>JakartaEE</tag>
                    <quickfix name="maven-javax-to-jakarta-00017-qf-artifactId" type="REPLACE">
                        <replacement>jboss-jakartaee-all-8.0</replacement>
                        <search>jboss-javaee-all-8.0</search>
                    </quickfix>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
